entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
